verses.verse: לַ֭מְנַצֵּחַ <WH5329> Lam-natz-tze-acho the chief Musician לְדָוִ֣ד <WH1732> [Tle-da-Vidof David מִזְמ֑וֹר <WH4210> miz-Mor; A Psalm יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh O LORD חֲ֝קַרְתַּ֗נִי <WH2713> cha-kar-Ta-ni, thou hast searched וַתֵּדָֽע׃ <WH3045> vat-te-Da'. me and known

אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> 'at-Tah You יָ֭דַעְתָּ <WH3045> Ya-da'-ta Thou knowest שִׁבְתִּ֣י <WH3427> shiv-Ti my downsitting וְקוּמִ֑י <WH6965> ve-ku-Mi; and mine uprising בַּ֥נְתָּה <WH995> Ban-tah thou understandest לְ֝רֵעִ֗י <WH7454> le-re-'I, my thought מֵרָחֽוֹק׃ <WH7350> me-ra-Chok. afar off

אָרְחִ֣י <WH734> 'a-re-Chi my path וְרִבְעִ֣י <WH7252> ve-riv-'I and my lying down זֵרִ֑יתָ <WH2219> ze-Ri-ta; Thou compassest וְֽכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol all דְּרָכַ֥י <WH1870> de-ra-Chai [with] all my ways הִסְכַּֽנְתָּה׃ <WH5532> his-Kan-tah. and art acquainted

כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki before אֵ֣ין <WH369> 'ein there מִ֭לָּה <WH4405> Mil-lah For [there is] not a word בִּלְשׁוֹנִ֑י <WH3956> bil-sho-Ni; in my tongue הֵ֥ן <WH2005> hen Behold יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh [but] lo O LORD יָדַ֥עְתָּ <WH3045> ya-Da'-ta thou knowest כֻלָּֽהּ׃ <WH3605> chul-Lah. all

אָח֣וֹר <WH268> a-Chor me behind וָקֶ֣דֶם <WH6924> va-Ke-dem and before צַרְתָּ֑נִי <WH6696> tzar-Ta-ni; Thou hast beset וַתָּ֖שֶׁת <WH7896> vat-Ta-shet and laid עָלַ֣י <WH5921> 'a-Lai and כַּפֶּֽכָה׃ <WH3709> kap-Pe-chah. thine hand

פִּלְאִיָּה pil-'i-yah כפְּלִ֣יאָֽה <WH6383> pe-Li-'ah secret קדַ֣עַת <WH1847> Da-'at [Such] knowledge מִמֶּ֑נִּי <WH4480> mi-Men-ni; is too נִ֝שְׂגְּבָ֗ה <WH7682> nis-ge-Vah, for me it is high לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- not א֥וּכַֽל <WH3201> 'U-chal I cannot לָֽהּ׃ Lah.

אָ֭נָ֥ה <WH575> 'a-Nah Where אֵלֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> 'e-Lech go מֵרוּחֶ֑ךָ <WH7307> me-ru-Che-cha; air וְ֝אָ֗נָה <WH575> ve-'A-nah, Where מִפָּנֶ֥יךָ <WH6440> mip-pa-Nei-cha accept אֶבְרָֽח׃ <WH1272> 'ev-Rach. flee

אִם־ <WH518> 'im- If אֶסַּ֣ק <WH5266> 'es-Sak If I ascend up שָׁ֭מַיִם <WH8064> ma-yim into heaven שָׁ֣ם <WH8033> sham are there אָ֑תָּה <WH859> 'At-tah; I וְאַצִּ֖יעָה <WH3331> ve-'atz-Tzi-'ah thou [art] there if I make my bed שְּׁא֣וֹל <WH7585> she-'ol in hell הִנֶּֽךָּ׃ <WH2005> hin-Ne-ka. behold

אֶשָּׂ֥א <WH5375> 'es-Sa [If] I take כַנְפֵי־ <WH3671> chan-fei- the wings שָׁ֑חַר <WH7837> Sha-char; of the morning אֶ֝שְׁכְּנָ֗ה <WH7931> 'esh-ke-Nah, [and] dwell בְּאַחֲרִ֥ית <WH319> be-'a-cha-Rit in the uttermost parts יָֽם׃ <WH3220> Yam. of the sea

גַּם־ <WH1571> ga-mo-Sha- Even שָׁ֭ם <WH8033> m there יָדְךָ֣ <WH3027> ya-de-Cha Even there shall thy hand תַנְחֵ֑נִי <WH5148> tan-Che-ni; lead וְֽתֹאחֲזֵ֥נִי <WH270> ve-to-cha-Ze-ni shall hold יְמִינֶֽךָ׃ <WH3225> ye-mi-Ne-cha. me and thy right hand

וָ֭אֹמַר <WH559> Va-'o-mar If I say אַךְ־ <WH389> 'ach- Surely חֹ֣שֶׁךְ <WH2822> Cho-shech Surely the darkness יְשׁוּפֵ֑נִי <WH7779> ye-shu-Fe-ni; shall cover וְ֝לַ֗יְלָה <WH3915> ve-Lay-lah, me even the night א֣וֹר <WH216> or shall be light בַּעֲדֵֽנִי׃ <WH1157> ba-'a-De-ni. about me

גַּם־ <WH1571> gam- Even חֹשֶׁךְ֮ <WH2822> cho-sheCh Yea the darkness לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- is not יַחְשִׁ֪יךְ <WH2821> yach-Shich hideth מִ֫מֶּ֥ךָ <WH4480> mi-Me-cha to You וְ֭לַיְלָה <WH3915> Ve-lay-lah not from thee but the night כַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> kai-Yom as the day יָאִ֑יר <WH215> ya-'Ir; shineth כַּ֝חֲשֵׁיכָ֗ה <WH2825> ka-cha-shei-Chah, the darkness כָּאוֹרָֽה׃ <WH219> ka-'o-Rah. and the light

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for אַ֭תָּה <WH859> 'At-tah You קָנִ֣יתָ <WH7069> ka-Ni-ta For thou hast possessed כִלְיֹתָ֑י <WH3629> chil-yo-Tai; my reins תְּ֝סֻכֵּ֗נִי <WH5526> te-suk-Ke-ni, thou hast covered בְּבֶ֣טֶן <WH990> be-Ve-ten womb אִמִּֽי׃ <WH517> 'im-Mi. me in my mother's

אֽוֹדְךָ֗ <WH3034> 'od-Cha, I will praise עַ֤ל <WH5921> 'al and כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki for נוֹרָא֗וֹת <WH3372> no-ra-'ot, thee for I am fearfully נִ֫פְלֵ֥יתִי <WH6395> nif-Lei-ti [and] wonderfully made נִפְלָאִ֥ים <WH6381> nif-la-'Im marvellous מַעֲשֶׂ֑יךָ <WH4639> ma-'a-Sei-cha; [are] thy works וְ֝נַפְשִׁ֗י <WH5315> ve-naf-Shi, and [that] my soul יֹדַ֥עַת <WH3045> yo-Da-'at knoweth מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> me-'Od. right well

לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- was not נִכְחַ֥ד <WH3582> nich-Chad was not hid עָצְמִ֗י <WH6108> 'a-tze-Mi, My substance מִ֫מֶּ֥ךָּ <WH4480> mi-Me-ka at אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- When עֻשֵּׂ֥יתִי <WH6213> 'us-Sei-ti from thee when I was made בַסֵּ֑תֶר <WH5643> vas-Se-ter; in secret רֻ֝קַּ֗מְתִּי <WH7551> ruk-Kam-ti, [and] curiously wrought בְּֽתַחְתִּיּ֥וֹת <WH8482> be-tach-ti-Yot in the lowest parts אָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> 'A-retz. of the earth

גָּלְמִ֤י׀ <WH1564> gal-Mi my substance yet being unperfect רָ֘א֤וּ <WH7200> ra-'U did see עֵינֶ֗יךָ <WH5869> 'ei-Nei-cha, Thine eyes וְעַֽל־ <WH5921> ve-'al- and in סִפְרְךָ֮ <WH5612> sif-re-Cha and in thy book כֻּלָּ֪ם <WH3605> kul-Lam were all יִכָּ֫תֵ֥בוּ <WH3789> yik-Ka-Te-vu all [my members] were written יָמִ֥ים <WH3117> ya-Mim [which] in continuance יֻצָּ֑רוּ <WH3335> yutz-Tza-ru; were fashioned; וְלֹא ve-lo כוְלֹ֖ו <WH3808> ve-Lo not קאֶחָ֣ד <WH259> 'e-Chad when [as yet there was] none בָּהֶֽם׃ ba-Hem.

וְלִ֗י ve-Li, מַה־ <WH4100> mah- How יָּקְר֣וּ <WH3365> ya-ke-Ru How precious רֵעֶ֣יךָ <WH7454> re-'Ei-cha also are thy thoughts אֵ֑ל <WH410> 'El; unto me O God מֶ֥ה <WH4100> meh How עָ֝צְמוּ <WH6105> 'A-tze-mu how great רָאשֵׁיהֶֽם׃ <WH7218> ra-shei-Hem. is the sum

אֶ֭סְפְּרֵם <WH5608> 'Es-pe-rem [If] I should count מֵח֣וֹל <WH2344> me-Chol than the sand יִרְבּ֑וּן <WH7235> yir-Bun; them they are more in number הֱ֝קִיצֹ֗תִי <WH6974> he-ki-Tzo-ti, when I awake וְעוֹדִ֥י <WH5750> ve-'o-Di I am still עִמָּֽךְ׃ <WH5973> 'im-Mach. with

אִם־ <WH518> 'im- O תִּקְטֹ֖ל <WH6991> tik-Tol Surely thou wilt slay אֱל֥וֹהַּ׀ <WH433> e-Lo-ah O God רָשָׁ֑ע <WH7563> ra-Sha'; the wicked וְאַנְשֵׁ֥י <WH582> ve-'an-Shei men דָ֝מִ֗ים <WH1818> da-Mim, from me therefore ye bloody ס֣וּרוּ <WH5493> Su-ru depart מֶֽנִּי׃ <WH4480> Men-ni. at

אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher they יֹ֭אמְרֻךָ <WH559> Yo-me-ru-cha For they speak לִמְזִמָּ֑ה <WH4209> lim-zim-Mah; against thee wickedly נָשֻׂ֖א <WH5375> na-Su take לַשָּׁ֣וְא <WH7723> lash-Shav [thy name] in vain עָרֶֽיךָ׃ <WH6145> 'a-Rei-cha. [and] thine enemies

הֲלֽוֹא־ <WH3808> ha-lo- not מְשַׂנְאֶ֖יךָ <WH8130> me-san-'Ei-cha Do not I hate יְהוָ֥ה׀ <WH3068> Yah-weh them O LORD אֶשְׂנָ֑א <WH8130> 'es-Na; that hate וּ֝בִתְקוֹמְמֶ֗יךָ <WH8618> u-vit-kom-Mei-cha, with those that rise up אֶתְקוֹטָֽט׃ <WH6962> et-ko-Tat. thee;and am not I grieved

תַּכְלִ֣ית <WH8503> tach-Lit them with perfect שִׂנְאָ֣ה <WH8135> sin-'Ah hatred שְׂנֵאתִ֑ים <WH8130> se-ne-Tim; I hate לְ֝אוֹיְבִ֗ים <WH341> le-'oy-Vim, I count them mine enemies הָ֣יוּ <WH1961> Ha-yu have become לִֽי׃ Li.

חָקְרֵ֣נִי <WH2713> cha-ke-Re-ni Search אֵ֭ל <WH410> 'el me O God וְדַ֣ע <WH3045> ve-Da' and know לְבָבִ֑י <WH3824> le-va-Vi; my heart בְּ֝חָנֵ֗נִי <WH974> be-cha-Ne-ni, try וְדַ֣ע <WH3045> ve-Da' me and know שַׂרְעַפָּֽי׃ <WH8312> sar-'ap-Pai. my thoughts

וּרְאֵ֗ה <WH7200> u-re-'Eh, And see אִם־ <WH518> 'im- if דֶּֽרֶךְ־ <WH1870> de-rech- way עֹ֥צֶב <WH6090> 'O-tzev if [there be any] wicked בִּ֑י Bi; וּ֝נְחֵ֗נִי <WH5148> u-ne-Che-ni, in me and lead בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> be-De-rech me in the way עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> o-Lam. everlasting
